app.rdg: because I complain a little, or because I can conceive a consolation for my toils which I <pb xml:id="F1818_v1_028" n="016"/>may never know, that I am wavering in my resolutions. Those are as fixed as fate; and my voyage is only now delayed until the weather shall permit my embarkation. The winter has been dreadfully severe; but the spring promises well, and it is considered as a remarkably early season; so
